properties.areaDesc: Lawrence, IL; Crawford, IL; Knox, IN; Sullivan, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 11:48AM EST until January 30 at 11:30PM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for portions of the following waterways
in Indiana...

Wabash River...White River...


.Minor flooding continues in western and southern Indiana on the
Wabash and White Rivers.  Moderate flooding is ongoing at Mount
Carmel.  Primary crests are comparable to those that occurred in
February and June of 2019.

Flooding along the lower portions of the White and Wabash Rivers
will conclude by the end of this month based on current projections.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Wabash River at Riverton.
* until Thursday January 30.
* At 11:00 AM Thursday the stage was 20.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 15.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...It will continue to fall to below flood stage by
Thursday January 30.
* At 20.0 feet...Extensive flooding is in progress.  Higher rural
roads begin to flood.  High water isolates many river cabins.  Seep
water becomes a problem.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
